title: ISic000323. I.Sicily inscription 000323
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) ((ivy-leaf)) M(anibus) ((ivy-leaf)) S(acrum) ((ivy-leaf))
L(ucius) ((ivy-leaf)) Arrius
Secundus
vix(it) ((ivy-leaf)) an(nos) ((ivy-leaf)) XVII
5marmorari
convive(ntes) ((ivy-leaf)) fecer(unt)

Apparatus criticus

Text of CIL

English translation

Sacred to the shades of the underworld. Lucius Arrius Secundus lived for 17 years. The stonemakers living with him made this.

translation

Den Seelen der Unterwelt gewidmet. Lucius Arrius Secundus lebte für 17 Jahre. Die Steinmacher, die mit ihm leben, haben das gemacht.

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.7039 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
